thread.title: Obama expected to announce new plan to keep 5,500 troops in Afghanistan
thread.title_full: Obama expected to announce new plan to keep 5,500 troops in Afghanistan

title: Obama expected to announce new plan to keep 5,500 troops in Afghanistan
text:
15 Obama expected to announce new plan to keep 5,500 troops in Afghanistan 
The Washington Post: President Obama is expected to announce a plan Thursday to keep 5,500 U.S. troops in Afghanistan into 2017, ending his ambitions to bring home most American forces from that war-torn country before he leaves office.The president’s decision came after an “extensive months-long review” that included regular discussions with Afghanistan’s leaders, his national security team and U.S. commanders in the field, a senior administration official said.
